code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./UserDetailsForm.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function UserDetailsForm(){const[name,setName]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();alert("Welcome, ".concat(name,"!"));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"user-details-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter your name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]});}export default UserDetailsForm;
